title: My Daily Routine
prompt: Describe your daily routine from morning to night, including your habits, work, meals, and relaxation time.
tips: Start with your morning activities like waking up and breakfast.
Describe your school or work routine.
Mention your lunch and evening activities.
Include how you relax and your bedtime routine.
Use time markers like ‘in the morning’, ‘after lunch’, ‘before bed’.
keyPoints: Morning routine (waking up, brushing teeth, breakfast)
Bedtime and preparations for the next day

title: A Special Day in My Life
prompt: Describe one special day in your life, including your activities and experiences.
tips: Start with why this day was special.
Describe what happened in the morning, afternoon, and evening.
Mention special moments and feelings.
Explain why you will always remember this day.
Use descriptive words to make your story interesting.
keyPoints: The impact of this day on your life

title: My Hobby
prompt: Describe your favorite hobby and why you enjoy doing it.
tips: Mention the name of your hobby.
Explain when and how often you do it.
Describe why you love it and how it benefits you.
Give examples of your best experiences with this hobby.
Use expressive words to show your passion.
keyPoints: The enjoyment and relaxation it brings
Skills or benefits gained from it
Future plans related to your hobby

title: A Memorable Childhood Memory
prompt: Describe a special moment from your childhood that you still remember.
tips: Describe the setting and people involved.
Explain what happened and why it was special.
Mention your emotions during the moment.
Explain why this memory stays with you.
Use sensory details like sights, sounds, and feelings.
keyPoints: The event and what made it special
Lessons or impact from the experience
Why it remains a strong memory

title: My Dream Job
prompt: Describe the job you want in the future and why it interests you.
tips: Mention the job title.
Describe what this job involves.
Explain why you like this profession.
Mention skills or education needed for this job.
Discuss how you plan to achieve your dream job.
keyPoints: Why this job is exciting or meaningful
Long-term dreams related to this career

title: My Family
prompt: Describe your family members and their roles.
tips: Mention how many members are in your family.
Describe each family member’s role.
Talk about family values and traditions.
Share special moments spent with your family.
Use warm and positive words to express your love for them.
keyPoints: Siblings and their relationship with you

title: The Person I Admire the Most
prompt: Speak about someone who inspires you and why you admire them.
tips: Mention their name and relationship to you.
Describe their qualities and achievements.
Explain why they inspire you.
Give examples of how they have influenced your life.
Use descriptive words to highlight their greatness.
keyPoints: How they have influenced your life

title: A Fun Day with My Siblings
prompt: Describe an enjoyable day spent with your brother or sister.
tips: Mention your sibling’s name and relationship with you.
Describe the activities you did together.
Explain why this day was so much fun.
Mention any challenges or funny moments.
Share what made this day memorable.
keyPoints: Challenges or surprises of the day

title: My Grandparents’ Stories
prompt: Speak about a story your grandparents told you.
tips: Mention who told you the story.
Describe what the story was about.
Explain the lesson or message of the story.
Share why this story is special to you.
Use storytelling techniques to make it engaging.

title: My School Days
prompt: Speak about your school memories, teachers, and friends.
tips: Mention your school name and location.
Describe your favorite subjects and teachers.
Talk about your friends and fun activities.
Share a memorable school event or trip.
Use nostalgic language to express your feelings.

title: The Importance of Education
prompt: Speak about why learning and going to school is important.
tips: Discuss how education provides knowledge and skills.
Explain how education helps in career growth.
Mention the role of education in personal development.
Talk about how education improves society.
Provide examples of how education shapes the future.
keyPoints: It helps in getting better job opportunities.
Education teaches life skills and decision-making.
A well-educated society leads to development.
Continuous learning is important for success.

title: My Favorite Sport
prompt: Speak about a sport you love to play or watch.
tips: Mention the name of the sport.
Explain the basic rules and how to play.
Talk about why you enjoy playing or watching it.
Mention any famous players you admire.
Share any personal experience with the sport.
keyPoints: How to play and key techniques.
Health and teamwork benefits of playing sports.

title: My Favorite Game
prompt: Speak about an indoor or outdoor game you enjoy.
tips: Mention the name of the game.
Describe how the game is played.
Explain why you enjoy playing it.
Mention if you play alone or with friends.
Share any special memories of playing this game.
keyPoints: How it helps improve skills and thinking.

title: A Visit to a Historical Place
prompt: Speak about a famous place you visited.
tips: Mention the name and location of the place.
Describe its historical significance.
Talk about what you saw and learned there.
Share your personal experience and feelings.
Explain why this place is important in history.

title: My Favorite Book
prompt: Describe a book that you loved reading.
tips: Mention the book title and author.
Summarize the main storyline.
Explain why you liked the book.
Talk about your favorite character or moment.
Discuss the lesson or message from the book.

title: The Importance of Trees
prompt: Explain why trees are important for the environment.
tips: Discuss how trees provide oxygen and clean the air.
Explain how trees support wildlife.
Talk about how trees prevent pollution and soil erosion.
Mention the role of trees in reducing global warming.
Provide examples of how tree planting benefits the Earth.
keyPoints: Trees provide oxygen and clean the air.
They are home to many animals and birds.
Trees help prevent soil erosion and floods.
Green spaces improve mental and physical health.
We should plant and protect more trees.

title: The Importance of Cleanliness
prompt: Speak about why staying clean is important.
tips: Explain why personal hygiene is necessary.
Talk about keeping your surroundings clean.
Mention how cleanliness prevents diseases.
Discuss good habits like washing hands and proper waste disposal.
Give examples of how cleanliness affects daily life.
keyPoints: Personal hygiene includes bathing and washing hands.
Good habits like waste management help society.
Clean surroundings make life more comfortable.

title: My First Job Experience
prompt: Speak about your first work experience.
tips: Mention where you worked and what your job was.
Describe your responsibilities and tasks.
Explain what you learned from the experience.
Share any challenges you faced and how you handled them.
Talk about how this job helped in your personal growth.
keyPoints: How the experience shaped your skills.

title: The Role of Technology in Our Lives
prompt: Describe how technology has changed daily life.
tips: Mention how technology has improved communication.
Talk about how it helps in education and work.
Explain the role of technology in entertainment and daily tasks.
Discuss the advantages and disadvantages of technology.
Give examples of how people depend on technology today.
keyPoints: Technology makes life easier and faster.
Education and work have improved with technology.
Entertainment and shopping are more convenient.
Disadvantages include addiction and privacy concerns.

title: My First Train Journey
prompt: Describe your first train trip experience.
tips: Mention where and when you traveled.
Describe what you saw from the train window.
Talk about the experience of traveling by train.
Mention any interesting people you met.
Share your overall feelings about the journey.
keyPoints: People and events during the journey.

title: A Trip I Enjoyed the Most
prompt: Speak about a picnic you went on, the place, activities, and the fun you had.
tips: Mention the location (park, beach, farm, etc.).
Describe the activities you did and the food you ate.
Talk about who was with you and your best moments.
Explain what made this trip special.
Share any funny or memorable incidents from the trip.
keyPoints: Best moments with family or friends

title: The Best Gift I Received
prompt: Speak about a special gift you received, who gave it to you, and why it is meaningful.
tips: Mention what the gift was and who gave it to you.
Describe the occasion when you received it.
Talk about your reaction upon receiving the gift.
Explain why the gift was special and meaningful.
Share how this gift impacted your life.
keyPoints: The occasion for receiving the gift
Feelings and reaction upon receiving it
Why this gift is valuable to you

title: A Day in My Village
prompt: Speak about your experience visiting a village and what you liked about it.
tips: Mention the name of the village and where it is located.
Describe the simple lifestyle of the people.
Talk about the natural beauty and fresh environment.
Explain what you enjoyed the most during the visit.
Share a memorable experience from the trip.
keyPoints: Name and location of the village
Nature, fresh air, and scenic beauty

title: My Summer Vacation
prompt: Speak about how you spent your summer holidays and what made them special.
tips: Mention where you spent your summer vacation.
Describe any trips, family gatherings, or activities.
Talk about something new you learned or experienced.
Share your best moments from the vacation.
Explain why this summer vacation was special to you.
keyPoints: Destination or activities during summer break
Time spent with family or friends

title: How to Be a Good Friend
prompt: Speak about the qualities of a good friend and how to maintain friendships.
tips: Explain what makes a good friend.
Mention important qualities like trust, honesty, and loyalty.
Talk about ways to support and help a friend.
Share an example of a strong friendship.
Discuss how to maintain long-lasting friendships.
keyPoints: How to be supportive and caring
Why friendships are important in life

title: A Memorable Journey
prompt: Describe a trip or journey you took and why it was special.
tips: Mention the destination and purpose of the journey.
Describe the travel experience and who accompanied you.
Talk about the sights and experiences during the journey.
Share the most memorable part of the trip.
Explain why this journey was special to you.
keyPoints: Destination and reason for the journey
Mode of travel and travel experience
Why this journey left a lasting impression

title: The Role of Technology in Communication
prompt: Discuss how technology has changed the way people communicate.
tips: Explain how mobile phones, emails, and social media help in communication.
Discuss both advantages and disadvantages of digital communication.
Mention how video calls and instant messaging have made global communication easier.
Talk about the impact of technology on relationships and businesses.
Give examples of how communication has evolved over time.
keyPoints: Importance of mobile phones and the internet
Social media and its influence on communication
Advantages of faster and easier interactions
Challenges like misinformation and lack of privacy
How technology continues to shape the way we connect

title: How I Overcame a Difficult Situation
prompt: Share a challenging situation you faced and how you handled it.
tips: Describe the problem and why it was difficult.
Talk about your emotions and thoughts at that time.
Explain the steps you took to solve or manage the situation.
Share any support or help you received.
Discuss what you learned from overcoming this challenge.
keyPoints: Actions taken to resolve the situation
Support from others and personal growth

title: The Importance of Teamwork in Work and Life
prompt: Explain why working together with others is important for success.
tips: Describe what teamwork means and why it is necessary.
Talk about how teamwork helps in school, work, and daily life.
Mention the skills needed for good teamwork (communication, cooperation, etc.).
Share an example of a time when teamwork helped achieve a goal.
Discuss how teamwork builds strong relationships.
keyPoints: Benefits in personal and professional life
Why collaboration leads to better results

title: The Impact of Social Media on Daily Life
prompt: Discuss how social media affects people's daily activities and mindset.
tips: Explain how social media connects people worldwide.
Talk about the benefits and drawbacks of social media usage.
Discuss how social media influences opinions and behaviors.
Mention how it affects productivity, mental health, and relationships.
Give examples of how people use social media in their daily lives.
keyPoints: Positive and negative effects of social media
How it changes communication and relationships
Its role in spreading information and awareness
Concerns about privacy and online addiction
Balancing social media usage for a healthy lifestyle
